reviews.review_msg: McCann is challenging, but excellent. I hate him, but love him. He kicked my butt at first, but with his guidance on writing and counseling, I did very well. This course is not easy, and neither is McCann, but he is the best profession I have had thus far. Be on your game, and do the readings.

BY FAR THE BEST GEOGRAPHY PROF AT SFU! For anyone who hasn't yet taken a class with eugene you are surely missing out. A very fair and organized prof who is passionate and interested in the material. Above all else, a friendly and easy going guy. Just awesome.

Great prof, always there to help if you have a question.  Fair marker, makes lectures interesting and uses real life examples to prove his points and theories.  Other Profs should take a note from him on how to properly teach!
Love his teaching style, he is very easy to talk to if you are having a problem.  I have taken 3 classes with his and I wish that he taught more!!!  Great Accent
